charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft. sentenced to serve 60 mos. imprisonment on counts 1 &; 6 to run concurrenlty with each other and 63 mos. on counts 8 &; 12 to run concurrenlty and concurrently with counts 1 &; 6, 3 yrs. supervised release on counts 1,6,8 &; 12 to run concurrenlty w ith each other, Restitution in the amount of $26,013.90 to be paid jointly with the co-dfts. and $400 special assessment. Dft. remanded to custody of USMS. AUSA: Daniel Brown Counsel: Steven Brown Courtreporter: Joan Koenig Courtroom Deputy : Lisa Wright

charges.charge_disposition: Dft. committed to 1 mos. imprisonment (to be served in the Ralph W. Alvis House), 3 yrs. supervised release, restitution in the amount of $7956.57 and $100 special assessment. The Court granted govt. motion for downward departure.
